caption.center: MILDRED W. CARNEY, APPELLANT, v. AL NICHOLSON, RESPONDENT.

court.center: Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District.

opinion.posture: APPEAL FROM THE CIRCUIT COURT OF JACKSON COUNTY; WILLIAM W. ELY, JUDGE.
opinion.attorneys:
Larry Delano Coleman, Kansas City, for appellant.
Bert Stephen Braud, Kansas City, for respondent.
opinion.panel: Before NUGENT, C.J., FENNER, J., and WASSERSTROM, Special Judge.
opinion.opinion_text:
[1] Appeal from order of trial court directing verdict against appellant at the close of her evidence.
[2] Judgment affirmed. Rule 84.16(b).Page 701
